p.b: Does Katalon Recorder collect the data and send to external services?

conbody.p: Katalon team do NOT collect information on end-users' test artifacts. Katalon Recorder will only save test artifacts on your local machine, and never send it to our server.

p.b: Will Katalon Recorder be maintained regularly?

conbody.p: Katalon team commit to maintaining both Katalon Recorder up to date and keeping the tools free of charge. 2021 Products Roadmap will be soon available to all users.

p.b: Is Katalon Recorder available for commercial use?

conbody.p: Katalon Recorder is free to use on any projects (commercial or not) of yours. But it's prohibited for you to sell/redistribute/decode Katalon Recorder.
Learn more in our free Katalon Academy course: Katalon Recorder: Test Automation for Start-Ups & Small Teams.
